  • Reference

Individuals data

Source: R/data.R
individuals.Rd

Personal data from the ECV for the years 2005, 2011, and 2019.

individuals

Format

A tibble (see tibble::tibble-package) with columns:

id_p

Person identifier.

id_hh

Household identifier.

ecv_year

The year the survey was conducted. Data refer to the previous year.

birth_year

The year of birth.

age

Age, in years.

sex

Factor with levels Female and Male.

absent

lowjob

eu2020

weight_p16

country_birth

Country of birth.

nationality

educ_year

educ

work_age

work_years

full_time

part_time

self

worker

unempl

inactive

has_worked

occup

Source

Microdata at INE, the Spanish Statistical Office
